programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep192
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam worked at a Chinese restaurant when they were young and both fell in love with the owners daughter, Yeung. Sung and Yeung eventually got married and took over the restaurant. Many years later, Sung meets Ha who is now a real estate tycoon and plans to buy out the restaurant. Can Sung save the restaurant?

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon Thundering Sword to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.desc: Indian Tamil action thriller film starring Vijay Antony and Aksha Pardasany.

programme.title: Kirumi
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Movie, Starring, Kathir, Reshmi Menon, Charle & Others. Kathir, a carefree young man, becomes a police informer like his neighbour Prabhakar, and begins to get too close with inspector Soundarapandian, despite the warnings of the latter. It is only when he tries to ride on an ego clash between Soundarapandian and Mathiarasu, a rival inspector, that he realizes he's become a pawn in a dangerous game

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep12
programme.desc: the adventures of Tapu and the Gokuldham Co-operative Housing Society, and if something wrong happens, Tapu and his friends solve the problems. Problems like robbery, fights or kidnapping are seen to be solved.

programme.desc: Its time to give a Hi-5 to the FAB 5! Thegang is always setting off on one or another adventure around the world to fulfilltheir missions.

programme.title: Fab5 Mission Tango Ep4
programme.desc: Its time to give a Hi-5 to the FAB 5! Thegang is always setting off on one or another adventure around the world to fulfilltheir missions.

programme.title: Hagola Ep32
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep33
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep43
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Birth Of A Super Hero - Shiro finally finds the Bobobobobone. As he prepares to transfer it to the Space Headquarters, he reflects on the day he became a superhero. It was an ordinary sunny day

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep13
programme.desc: A Wild Can - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found at a can factory. Shiro wants to open a can to smell it but a hero shouldn't open one without permission. Deca starts opening cans carelessly.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Enchanting Cancan - This time, traces of the Bobobobobone are found in a pancake. While on his mission, Shiro's nose picks up a good scent. He is distracted by the smell and takes a detour.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep15
programme.desc: A Fun Day At The Bowling Center - One of the pins at the bowling alley is the Bobobobobone. Shiro wants to play, but he has bigger responsibilities. Deca arrives and throws Shiro like a bowling ball.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Umbrellas Are Easily - One of the umbrellas in the lost-and-found centre at the train station is the Bobobobobone. Shiro is surprised at the number of lost-and-found items. Deca attacks Shiro.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep17
programme.desc: A Dangerous Construction Site - One of the bolts used to build a skyscraper might be the Bobobobobone. Shiro climbs the steel frames but the construction site is dangerous. Will Shiro reach the bolt?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Bo Bo Bottles - Tomorrow is bottle collection day and traces of the Bobobobobone are found in the bottles. Shiro and Deca try to find the Bobobobobone before it falls into human hands.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Duel At The Corn Field - The Bobobobobone is somewhere in the corn field. It seems like an endless search, but luckily, it's found without much trouble. Deca starts attacking Shiro with a machine.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Cancan Loves The Swing - CanCan wants to go on the swing at the park. Shiro and Deca stand in line just for her. When they finally get to the front, they find traces of the Bobobobobone on the swing.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Trouble At Smelt Fishing - Traces of the Bobobobobone are detected on fish scales by the lake. When Shiro arrives at the frozen lake, he drills a hole in it and competes with Deca at smelt-fishing.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Lunch Time Is Quiet Time - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found at the Nohara family's home. Shiro must retrieve the Bobobobobone while the family naps, making sure no one realises he's a superhero.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Can I Keep It? - After stumbling upon a cute cat-dog-rabbit creature hybrid, or 'Cadobbit', Ben ignores Grandpa Max's advice and sneaks the animal onto the Rustbucket, but is soon in over his head as it turns on him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Battle At Biggie Box - Ben and Billy Billions go head-to-head over a Sumo Slammer Set sold exclusively inside the world's largest shopping centre, only to find six-year-old Simon Sez has gotten to it first.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bon Voyage - Aboard the SS Pettigrew on its final voyage, Ben must battle seasickness as well as Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The 11th Alien, Part 1 - With new Omni-Enhancements in tow, Ben plans on saving a town from a sudden mudslide, but his heroics are short-lived once Vilgax appears to warn him about the Omnitrix's mysterious new alien.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep6
programme.desc: The 11th Alien, Part 2 - After discovering that Vilgax has joined forces with the Weatherheads, Ben must not only overcome his doubts, but must also fully embrace his new powers if he is to beat his foes.

programme.desc: Room Service Robots / Coney Island Adventure / Scents And Sensibility / Wrecking Ball - A troop of robot bellhops cause trouble, Tom becomes canine catnip and more.

programme.desc: Welcome To Paradise, Now Die! - Magnum recruits Katsumoto to help find a missing tourist. Higgins and Kumu attempt to solve the murder of a beloved dog. Rick enlists the aid of TC after he accidentally loses Magnums pet mouse, Roberto II.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep6
programme.desc: Dead Ringer - Katsumotos hearing date has arrived and he will learn if his career in law enforcement is over for good or not. Magnum and Higgins are hired to investigate a man their client believes committed murder. Ricks suspicions grow on their relationship.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep7

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland - The Volcanic Highlands - The central highlands of Iceland are otherworldly. Situated at an altitude of approx. 450 meters above sea level, the region experiences some of the most inhospitable weather on the planet.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep1
programme.desc: French Polynesia - Martin explores French Polynesia through French baguettes and coral wine, and on a Polynesian outrigger canoe. He swims with sharks, investigates Marlon Brando's wildlife programme, and sails to the remote Marquesas to meet a local horse whisperer.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Jaffa Cakes - Gregg Wallace visits a Manchester factory that churns out 6 million Jaffa Cakes every single day.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Shangri La - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep7

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep7
programme.desc: Vegan Sausages - Gregg Wallace visits a Yorkshire team that churn out up to 90,000 vegan sausages a day! Historian Ruth Goodman uncovers the green shoots of the vegetarian movement in Britain.

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Namib: Skeleton Coast and Beyond - The Namib Desert is one of the oldest deserts of all; it's also one of the most diverse.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy city's annual procession.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep4
programme.desc: Off the Deep End - Alaskans rediscover old practises to get through the heart of winter.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Japan - Robson fishes for some of Japan's famous fish, including the famously poisonous Fugu and other exotic catches.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tides - Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino - T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollinators - The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild Easts most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Chemical Weapons - Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Crocodiles - Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; theyre among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now theyre protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Pantanal - The Pantanal is one of the worlds great reservoirs for plant and animal life. Scientists estimate that its home to 80 species of mammals, 650 species of birds, 50 species of reptiles, and over 300 species of fish. Its the largest tropical wetland on Earth, yet its also one of the most unforgiving habitats to call home.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4

programme.desc: City - Its Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifaxs raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Strange Powers - Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Dazzle Dragon - Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep12
programme.desc: Cry Cold - Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep44

programme.desc: Rebirth - When a Galra monster descends upon the Balmera, Team Voltron must find a way to save the deteriorating living planet and its alien inhabitants

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep10
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter One - Eager to come face-to-face with a real life monster, Rocky and Bullwinkle buy a creepy old mansion in hopes of finding a real monster

programme.desc: Telethon / Enrico Caruso - When Sherman makes a million-dollar pledge to his school's charity to win an awesome video game, he didn't realize they actually expect him to pay

programme.desc: Spooktacular / Nicolas-Joseph Cugnot - When Peabody and Sherman accidentally drink a mad scientist's potion, they turn into hideous monsters and put on the spookiest and scariest show ever

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep7
programme.desc: Naked Mole Wrath/Momma Leaf - The Mighty Ones think they are being menaced by a vicious mole rat, but it's a case of mistaken identity. / Leaf discovers eggs stuck to his body and enlists Twig's help so he can be a good momma.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Twig for a Day/Eternal Day - In an attempt to understand Twig better and demonstrate their appreciation for him, the Mighty Ones try to live a day as Twig. But when they end up in a precarious situation, four Twigs won't do, and they must utilize their individual strengths in order to save themselves. / The humans in the house install a very bright light in the backyard, creating an eternal day for the Mighty Ones, who get a little loopy as a result.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep33
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Madly Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madly Madagascar - Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep74
programme.desc: Not A Date - When Puss and Dulcinea go on a vacation with all the San Lorenzans tagging along, thieves show up and El Moco takes them captive

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep15
programme.desc: Hair-Jitsu / Crushin' It - Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep37
programme.desc: Lucky and the Resolutionary Fever - Lucky rushes to complete all of last years resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Years Eve

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep77
programme.desc: The End Is Near - When King Julien learns that Clover may marry Sage, he sets out to prepare the kingdom for post-Clover attacks

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep78
programme.desc: The End Is Here - When King Julien and the gang bury Sage for his bachelor party, things don't go according to plan and they must deal with Franken-Sage!

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep33
programme.desc: Nepal: Yeti Or Not - When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out its another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - Its Pawstons annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and its Tags year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep13
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sticky Putty - Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep13
programme.desc: Marsha Wonderful Life - Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Accidents - Something strange is happening in Toyland trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Hear It For Big Chris - Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King's Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep45
programme.desc: Gearwigs - Click-Clack climbs out of his comfort zone to make sure his ideas are heard when the Dinotrux hatch a plan to stop D-Structs from stealing supplies.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep45
programme.desc: Crew Detective/Whiplash Effect - Whiplash interrogates the crew to find out who broke his stuff; the crew tricks Whiplash into having a fun, new personality after he loses his memory.

programme.desc: Once Upon A Girl Day / Cop College - Tip and Oh join Chelsea and Apple for a "Girls Day"/When the Chicago cops discover that Kyle has been policing without a humans badge, they send him to Copy College

programme.desc: Return of the Thinking Squad - It's a bird! It's a plane! No, it's a clue! The Thinking Squad needs to find all three clues to figure out how to stop the dastardly Villain Ice before he freezes Super City. Thinking Squad, to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103

Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save a Yodeler - When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Sing Your Voice Out - After losing his voice, Bossy must do the one thing he's terrible at: being quiet.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep124

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Bubble Bubble Bossy and Trouble - Bossy and Turtle blow the perfect bubble and will do anything to keep it from popping.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Pirate Painter - When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203

However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep406

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep418

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301

programme.desc: The Shiniest Shell - Bossy and Turtle try to keep Turtle's shell shiny for the school photo.

programme.desc: Teacher's Pets - Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Animal House Party - When Derek overhears that Alvin and his brothers are alone for the weekend, he plans a wild party at their house.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy / The Crush - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class. // Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Best in Shoe / Royal Pain - To land the lead role in a play, Alvin wagers Brittany that he can remain in character as a shoe cobbler. // When Brittany becomes convinced she's a long lost princess she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep181
programme.desc: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby - SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep182
programme.desc: Little Yellow Book / Bumper to Bumper - Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep122
programme.desc: A Root Galoot - The Star family brings a mandrake root into their home.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Pat's A Li'l Sinker / Camp SpongeBob - Mrs. Puff gives swimming lessons to Patrick after realizing he never got his swim badge. // SpongeBob finds himself all alone in the camp, but that doesn't stop him from having a blast.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell - Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep511
programme.desc: School of Shock / Elecshunned - Lisa takes over her first-grade classroom and learns that there's more to teaching than just knowing facts. // Leni goes toe-to-toe with the Mayor in a city-wide Royal Woods election.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Hurl, Interrupted / Diamonds are for Never - Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret. // After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep309
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist / Missed Connection - Lisa gets invited to work at an institute and get away from her crazy family. // Lori and Bobby worry that dating long-distance is causing them to lose their connection.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep268
programme.desc: A Place for Pets - When customers bring pets into the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs soon realizes pets are more profitable than owners.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: The Hankering - Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Pat Hearts Squid - Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Gossip Girl - When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Walk Don't Run - In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Bunstoppable - While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep153
programme.desc: The Other Patty - Mr. Krabs and Plankton may finally agree on something, when the popular new "Flabby Patty" restaurant threatens to steal their customers!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Midnight Stranger - When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Po Who Cried Ghost - Po's worst childhood fears come true when he comes face to face with hopping ghosts!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Zuko Alone - Traveling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: P.E.L.T. - Skipper's losing it. He has to prove he can still lead the squad.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Nuts to You / The Terror of Madagascar - Fred the Squirrel has hit the jackpot. He stumbles onto a jackpot oak tree which is loaded with acorns (that's tons of money to animal folk). // When a Baby Fossa is delivered to the Zoo everyone is excited except for King Julien.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains / P.E.L.T. - It's a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Julien's determined to taste them too. // Skipper's losing it. He has to prove he can still lead the squad.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Avatar Day - Aang must clear up a wave of anti-Avatar sentiment and atone for something he did in the past.

programme.desc: Zuko Alone - Traveling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pulling Power / Home Security - Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that three's a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that there's more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep126
programme.desc: One Better Day - Part 1 / One Better Day - Part 2 - Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pogo Sticks / Car Wash - To attend the Rat Bros' party, the trio tries to get their hands on the latest cool item: pogo sticks. // Rock tries to get a job at Evil Robot Corp. Paper and Scissors see if the company is exactly what it sounds like.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep707
programme.desc: Dadbracadbra / Timmy Turnip - With Timmys help. Dad's magic tricks really work. Convinced that Timmy's dad is a fairy, Crocker is out to uncover his secret on national television. // Timmy wishes, his grandparents had never came to America and finds himself back in Ustinkistan.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep611
