programme.title: India Now: Summer Special Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Avani Dias looks at some of the issues in Indian society including why textbooks are rewriting history, the long shadow of British colonialism, how each sari tells a story, India's love of whiskey plus the secret of a spice.

programme.title: Indonesia Decides Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hellena Souisa interviews presidential candidate and former Governor of Jakarta Anies Baswedan, we explore freedom of speech, a growing digital economy and ask young voters how they cope with cost-of-living pressures. (Final)

programme.title: Things That Made Australia - Gold Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2022 - Tim Lee looks at the profound impact the discovery of gold had on colonial Australia. The precious metal gave the country much more than wealth.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Kuitpo Song Tower Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Cate and Nick Foskett have put their high powered careers on hold to forge a new life as winemakers and build a new home on their 150 acre property in the Adelaide Hills.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Rosie Lloyd-Gibett - Artist Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Meet an artist whose textural work is inspired by the natural landscape of the Noosa National Park.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep44
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Week 2 is all about Brainpower, with a range of brain boosting activities designed to strengthen the mind and encourage the participants to learn from one another.

programme.title: Nemesis - The Turnbull Years Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - With Malcolm Turnbull installed as Prime Minister, after bringing down Tony Abbott, hopes were riding high. But what followed was a Shakespearean drama resulting in another Prime Minister dispatched.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Kuitpo Song Tower Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Cate and Nick Foskett have put their high powered careers on hold to forge a new life as winemakers and build a new home on their 150 acre property in the Adelaide Hills.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Sophie Thomson visits a eucalyptus oil farm, Costa Georgiadis reworks a banana circle, Tino Carnevale explores a home-grown arboretum, and we visit the home of an interior stylist whose indoor plant collection will amaze you.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: The Business Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: The World Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Emma Rebellato and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: If You're Listening - Panda Diplomacy Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - China's pandas are not just pandas. They're diplomats. In recent years China has been hostile toward the West, with the most literal symbol of their displeasure being the withdrawal of their pandas from zoos around the world.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Jane Edmanson revives indoor orchids, Millie Ross visits a sky-high garden, Clarence Slockee meets volunteering native plant enthusiasts and Sophie Thomson explores a horticulturalist's home plant collection.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bee Challenge Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In the first of two programs, host Paul West challenges four families to successfully keep a honeybee hive, bringing these everyday Australians up close to the latest science about bee brains, communication and behaviour.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Bungle Bungles, Coranderrk, Cairns Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie experiences the breathtaking Bungle Bungles in the heart of the Kimberley, Narelda visits Coranderrk with a Wurundjeri elder and Aaron steps into the studio with didge-legend Dave Hudson.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon Rocky Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep501BryceMitchellGigaChikadzeHenriHooftCirylGane
programme.desc: Arkansas' Bryce Mitchell tells us what it means to be a home-grown fighter, Giga Chikadze breaks down his most lethal striking moves, Henri Hooft gives an insight into his career in the corner of the worlds best fighters, and we join Interim Heavyweight Champ Ciryl Gane on a media tour around his home city of Paris.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev
programme.desc: UFC 280 featured a battle for the vacant lightweight title between former champion Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Plus, Aljamain Sterling defended his bantamweight belt against TJ Dillashaw. See the whole main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hermansson vs. Pyfer
programme.desc: Prelims - Philadelphia finisher Joe Pyfer went viral with his knockout win on Dana Whites Contender Series, and after three more big wins in the Octagon, he will make his first main event appearance at the APEX in Las Vegas on February 11 against perennial middleweight contender Jack Hermansson. With Pyfer sporting a 92 percent finish rate and Hermansson ending 17 of his 23 wins before the final horn, the odds are strong that this UFC Fight Night headliner wont be going the distance, and that has fight fans eagerly anticipating this 185-pound showdown

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hermansson vs. Pyfer

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley
